title: Noah's Neighbor
features: A delightful children's book written and illustrated by Dale Reich about a young boy named Noah who learns the value of being a good neighbor.
description: Dale Reich, also known as "Bumpa" to his four grandsons, is a retired teacher who lives in Wisconsin. He enjoys reading books to children as well as writing and illustrating them. Dale believes that one of the greatest gifts that a parent can give his or her child is to read them a bedtime story every night. "It was the best part of each day as my children were growing up," he says. "I just wish I could go back and do it all over again! I hope my children feel the same way."
